text: Prepubertal hypertrichosis is a cutaneous condition characterized by increased hair growth,Hair Growth Vitamins Retrieved 19 June 2011 and is a relatively common finding in otherwise healthy infants and children, most often occurring in individuals of Mediterranean or South Asian descent. == See also == * Hypertrichosis * List of cutaneous conditions == References == Category:Conditions of the skin appendages
title: Prepubertal hypertrichosis
